Class Summary
HashFNV Syntax: long HashFNV(String string_to_hash, [int mod]).

INDEXOF Deprecated. Use INDEXOF
LASTINDEXOF Deprecated. Use LAST_INDEX_OF
LcFirst Deprecated. Use LCFIRST
LENGTH string.LENGTH implements eval function to find length of a string Example: register piggybank.jar; A = load 'mydata' as (name); B = foreach A generate string.LENGTH(name); dump B;

Reverse

Stuff Given a string, this UDF replaces a substring given its starting index and length with the given replacement string.
